pageProduct.name: Sunsense Sport SPF 50+ Sunscreen 200G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Lasting sun protection designed for people on the go.

SunSense Sport is a highly protective lotion best suited to those enjoying an active, outdoors lifestyle. Suitable for all skin types.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Always read the label. Use only as directed.
If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• UVA and UVB Broad Spectrum Sun Protection
• Sand & sweat resistant
• 4 hours water resistant
• Fragrance free
• Contains moisturising Vitamin B3 (Nicotinamide) to help maintain the normal skin barrier function and improve the appearance of skin tone and texture

Ingredients

Diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate 2.5%, octyl triazone 1.5%, oxybenzone 2.0%, titanium dioxide 2.0% Hydroxybenzoates, phenoxyethanol

Directions

Apply sunscreen liberally to clean, dry skin at least 20 minutes prior to sun exposure. Be careful to avoid eyes and contact with broken skin. Reapply sunscreen every 2 hours and after swimming, exercise and towelling dry. Remember to avoid prolonged sun exposure and wear protective clothing, hats and eyewear to further reduce risk. Do not inhale product.
